data.title: Add private chat
data.body: So you can send private messages to specific players, even enemies.

data.title: Fixed drawing lines under the fog
data.body: Fixed https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/7498 so that lines won't be drawn if the actor has moved in the shroud.

data.title: Unable to force fire on 3/4 cells on a bridge
data.body:
If i force fire on the one cell that gives me an attack order icon the bridge gets destroyed but the units continue shooting after the bridge is destroyed. If I force fire at any of the other tree cells it will only show a move order icon and will only result in a move order unless there is a unit occupying that cell. 
The working cell:
![116f1fa4-bceb-11e4-80f8-c55c6c46a78e](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7798635/7874867/eba70e9e-05b5-11e5-91df-603f487a5dd3.png)
The none working cells:
![22e8cce4-bceb-11e4-9d47-c9b897cd4ae2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7798635/7874872/f2aad55e-05b5-11e5-9209-f1c698a8e410.png)

data.title: Was able to recharge 5 helis on 3 helipads at the same time
data.body:
Here is an image, if you look closely you can see two helicopters on the far right pad and one helicopter in between the pads. 
![8317451c-bce8-11e4-9ef6-b0eb8e7e88f1](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7798635/7874831/52c0b0cc-05b5-11e5-94e0-a1ef32ef87ad.png)

data.title: Friendly fire fixes and sam sites
data.body:
This PR will fix the following issues:

https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/7442

^ is solved by clearing the turret activities when not being able to attack (during low power).

https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/7403

^ is being solved by clearing the targets when the owner is changed.

data.title: Fix bad behaver on InterpretServerOrders
data.body: fixes #7515

data.title: Fixed AppVeyor deployment
data.body:
This fixes the recent problem introduced in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7510 and the one I introduced in https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7351 myself. This will also fix our build badge as for some reason 

``` yaml
deploy:
    on:
      branch: master
      appveyor_repo_tag: true
```

is ignored.

data.title: Fixed the hard-coded Dune 2000 production tab hotkeys
data.body: A followup of https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/pull/7384. This makes them configurable in the Input tab and displays them in the tooltip.

data.title: Changed the Dune 2000 mod chooser description
data.body: as we now have sandworms, carryalls and concrete this is not "Red Alert with sand" anymore. No need to degrade the mod in the description. The other ones focus on describing the game universe so adapt to that.

data.title: (Fixed in release 2016-10-19) Units get stuck on bridges
data.body:
From time to time a vehicle gets stuck on bridges, it might be after giving a new move order as it is passing over a bridge. I have not been able to get units stuck on longer bridges.
![dy3fcij](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7798635/6341942/46dc4d3a-bbd1-11e4-9fca-1821fd88bc5d.png)

Ok so this is how you reproduce this:
1. Move the vehicle south of the bridge.
2. Try to move the vehicle to the cell on the bridge in the picture, it won't go to it directly so move it over the cell then give it a new move order or press "s" (default) as it is in this cell and it gets stuck every time. 
![openra game_2015_02_25_10_33_04_371](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7798635/6368125/0043996e-bcda-11e4-8d50-f9b36c4f4433.png)

This happens to infantry as well.

data.title: Give ally players a yellow health bar (team health colors)
data.body:
Was originally noted in #2462 but missed. Helps to differentiate your own forces from an ally.

Down the road, or even now, we should make these colours configurable for colorblindness. Several RTS replace green with blue as an example.

data.title: (Duplicate of #4605) Heli can share a cell with other units
(Fixed in release 2016-10-19) Unable to attack enemy
data.body:
Closing this, see #9529

In this image you can see the camo pillbox is unable to target the rifle man and the rocket solider finishes him of in 10 or so shots. It might be because he is stuck in the husk but why the rocket solider can target him is unknown to me.
![yrajipg](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/7798635/6340441/923bb0d4-bbbf-11e4-9cec-4c8a987780fe.png)

data.title: Cleanup: Moved audio-related yamls to audio subfolder
data.body: Additionally, slightly reordered content of mod yamls so the audio stuff is grouped together.

data.title: added mission nod4a
data.body:
After a break, here we go again.

I think there are a few points that can be discussed on this  mission.

So happy testing and I am waiting for your comments.

data.title: Split RA weapons.yaml into multiple roughly categorized files
data.body:
Took the same approach as for CnC mod.

Note: For what it's worth, I did compare the number of weapons, it was 62 before and after splitting the file.

data.title: Adjust DisabledOverlay.ModifyRender to be more efficient.
data.body:
When not disabled, ModifyRender doesn't actually alter the sequence, so we can just return it directly and avoid adding another layer of enumerable. If it is disabled, then the modifying enumerable has one less condition to check inside the loop.

Note: This is basically the same PR as #7292, just applied to the disabled overlay instead.

data.title: Fix some broken Stream.Read calls.
data.body: Catch a few more cases of Stream.Read being called incorrectly, similar to #5509.

data.title: Can't move viewport by clicking on minimap [bleed]
data.body: Happens for me in both RA & TD, on bleed

data.title: Add Kill/Death ratio in statistics window
data.body: closes #6858

data.title: Add "(Ally)" behind the name of allies in all-chat
data.body: Fixes #7518

data.title: Increase ItemSpacing in CHAT_TEMPLATE for the lobby chat
data.body:
Fixes #7447

![image](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2461972/6329206/9ff79ff4-bb6e-11e4-916a-c743d08c0741.png)

data.title: Remove obsolete DLL references from mod.yaml files
data.body:
One of the reasons for migrating all the code from `OpenRA.Mods.RA` to `OpenRA.Mods.Common` was that a mod should not depend on another mod in any way (for the official mods, at least).
But I see `mod.yaml` files containing this:

> Assemblies:
>     ./mods/common/OpenRA.Mods.Common.dll
>     ./mods/ra/OpenRA.Mods.RA.dll
>     ./mods/cnc/OpenRA.Mods.Cnc.dll
>     ./mods/d2k/OpenRA.Mods.D2k.dll

Once the migration to `Mods.Common` is complete each mod should reference only the common DLL and its own.
Putting this here so I don't forget about it as easily.
## <bountysource-plugin>

Want to back this issue? **[Post a bounty on it!](https://www.bountysource.com/issues/8815182-remove-obsolete-dll-references-from-mod-yaml-files?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github)** We accept bounties via [Bountysource](https://www.bountysource.com/?utm_campaign=plugin&utm_content=tracker%2F36085&utm_medium=issues&utm_source=github).
</bountysource-plugin>

data.title: Refactor EnemyWatcher and AnnounceOnSeen traits
data.body:
- Introduce the `INotifyDiscovered` interface
- Move voice and radar notifications from `EnemyWatcher` to `AnnounceOnSeen` using the above interface
- Track players that have been discovered (also could serve as foundation for #7391, if we decide we want to update the UI or something when a player has been revealed)
- Remove `AnnounceOnSeen.Notification`'s default value and make the announcement less prone to crashes due to invalid value on that

Split off from #7492

data.title: Fix the EnemyWatcher trait (hotfix)
data.body: Fixing two things that popped up in today's test game with @obrakmann and @pchote - notification intervals and players that hear the notifications. Currently in a muliplayer game you hear everyone's notifications, not just yours.

data.title: No super-weapons option in skirmish/multiplayer
data.body: It would be quite nice to be able to disable super-weapons in skirmishes and multiplayer games. I'd be happy to implement this feature.

data.title: Sell and power down icon fixed on captured building
data.body: The user can't sell or powerdown a building when it is being captured, the icon however indicated that this was possible. See #7508.

data.title: Forgot shroud on all-cheat
data.body: I forgot the disableshroud on the "all" cheat. I also merged some lines together in one assignment.

data.title: Z-Buffer support
data.body:
~~Corpses being rendered above vehicles is looking glitchy and bugging me for quite some time. Somehow not easy to fix. The ZOffset is ignored. I tried adding it to sequences and hard-coded into the corpse effect.~~

Already fixed by https://github.com/OpenRA/OpenRA/issues/10119.

data.title: Change default facing to 0
data.body:
As noone can say what the reason was for the previous default value of 128, and the original games used 0 as default facing as well according to reaperrr, I went ahead and changed it.

I did not notice any impact ingame, except that the starting MCV in skirmish games then faced north, so I added a little change to fix that. The facing of the other starting units was already randomized. Everything else continues to work as before.

Fixes #7516.
